default.title: The online home of Neil Hughes
default.description: Neil Hughes is a comedian, author, speaker and mental health campaigner.

home.title: The online home of Neil Hughes
home.description: Neil Hughes is a comedian, author, speaker, software developer and mental health campaigner.

shop_before_life.title: The Shop Before Life - a novel by Neil Hughes
shop_before_life.description: Before being born, everybody visits a magical shop to choose who they will become on Earth. But the new Apprentice has some questions...

speaking.title: Speaker on Mental Health & Comedian - Neil Hughes
speaking.description: Neil Hughes gives funny, hilarious and helpful talks and presentations on anxiety and mental health.

now.title: Neil Hughes - Author, Speaker, Comedian - Now
now.description: What is Neil Hughes—comedian, writer, physicist and fool—doing right now?

books.title: Books by Neil Hughes
books.description: Comedian and author Neil Hughes has written a number of books, including 'Walking on Custard' and 'The Shop Before Life'

anxiety.title: Anxiety Resources - by Neil Hughes
anxiety.description: Neil Hughes lived with anxiety for years before writing a funny book about anxiety. Now he helps others with their mental health.

walking_on_custard.title: The Best Funny Book about Anxiety: Walking on Custard
walking_on_custard.description: Comedian Neil Hughes lived with anxiety for years. But thinking about custard led to a surprising solution. "A must read for anyone suffering from anxiety".

contact.title: Contact - Neil Hughes
contact.description: Get in touch with Neil Hughes about books, comedy, mental health, custard or anything else.

comedy_writing.title: Comedy Consulting - Help writing funny speeches - by Neil Hughes
comedy_writing.description: Need help writing a funny speech? Neil Hughes can help you with jokes and presentations.

articles.title: Articles - by Neil Hughes
articles.description: Neil Hughes writes helpful articles about life, productivity, multiple interests, mental health and more.

occasional_email_experience.title: The Occasional Email Experience
occasional_email_experience.description: An irregular, funny newsletter about life, by Neil Hughes.

interactive.title: Cool interactive stuff - by Neil Hughes
interactive.description: Neil Hughes is a software developer who creates cool things.

support.title: Support mental health events in schools - by Neil Hughes
support.description: Neil Hughes gives talks about mental health in schools - you can support him here.

confirm_signup.title: Please confirm signup - Occasional Email Experience
confirm_signup.description: The Occasional Email Experience is an irregular email newsletter full of funny stories and advice about life.

signup_confirmed.description: The Occasional Email Experience is an irregular email newsletter full of funny stories and advice about life.
